title: Stainless Steel Clasp for Leather Watch Band Strap Single Fold Deployment Buckle Polished Butterfly Clasp Silver Rose Gold 14mm/16mm/18mm/20mm/22mm
features: Material: Make of high quality polished finish stainless steel,single fold deployment buckle,general style suitable for daily wearing.
Easy installation: 4 spring bars and 1 spring bar tools help you install and remove easily.
Band Width: 14mm,16mm,18mm,20mm,22mm;Color: silver,rose gold suitable for most leather watch bracelet.
Package Included: 1 x Stainless steel watch clasp; 1 x Spring bar tool; 4 x Spring bars; 1 x Cleaning cloth.

Be aware: Please measure the width of watchband end linked to the clasp before you purchase. If you have any problem about the clasp,please kindly contact us,we will try our best to solve your problem.
description: Package Included: 1 x Stainless steel watch clasp; 1 x Spring bar tool; 4 x Spring bars; 1 x Cleaning cloth.

Be aware: the width we mentioned is the clasp itself, not the width of the strap it fits. If you have a 20mm strap, it may fit a 18mm clasp or a 16mm clasp. So please measure the width of watchband end linked to the clasp before you purchase.
